messages.content: What feature does the TinkerBot-tech-for-ComfyUI-Touchpad extension provide for ComfyUI?
The TinkerBot-tech-for-ComfyUI-Touchpad extension provides touchpad two-finger gesture support for macOS.
Which issues does this extension fix?
This extension fixes issue #2059 on the ComfyUI repository on GitHub.
What are the two-finger gestures supported by this extension?
The extension supports two-finger gestures such as vertical and horizontal scrolling for panning the canvas, and pinch for zooming in and out.
What is the keyboard shortcut for zooming in and out?
The command-scroll up and down gesture is used to zoom in and out.
How do you install the TinkerBot-tech-for-ComfyUI-Touchpad extension?
To install, place the folder in ComfyUI/custom_nodes/TinkerBot-tech-for-ComfyUI-Touchpad, restart ComfyUI, and reload the UI.
